instructions.title: How To Delete Your Telegram Account
instructions.before: It is recommended that you delete your Telegram Account by opening the link to the deactivation page. However, there are steps to follow to delete your account by navigating through the Telegram App on your mobile Device if preferred.
instructions.after: Please note that termination of a Telegram account is an irreversible process.

qnAnswers.question: What happens if I delete my Telegram Account?
qnAnswers.answer: All your data will be flushed from their system: all messages, groups, and contacts associated with your account will be deleted.

qnAnswers.question: What happens to my the messages I have sent to contacts when I delete my account?
qnAnswers.answer: Your contacts will still be able to chat in the groups that you have created, and they will still have their copy of the messages you sent them. So if you want to send messages that can vanish without a trace, you can consider using the self-destruct timer instead. [Click here for more information on the Self-destruct timer] (https://telegram.org/faq#q-how-do-self-destructing-messages-work).

qnAnswers.question: Can I delete my Account from my mobile device?
qnAnswers.answer: The quick answer is Yes. But you must navigate to the deactivation page through the mobile app.   However, we recommend that you use a non-mobile browser if possible.

steps: Tap Settings Gear on Bottom Right
Scroll Down to Your Account and Tap Deleting your Account
Enter Your Phone Number to Re-Login and wait for Confirmation Code
Tap the Telegram Message on the top of the Screen to Open
Copy the confirmation code sent to your Telegram Account
Enter the Confirmation Code and Tap done
Give a reason for Deletion and Tap Done
